title: Frontend Developer
description: PixelPerfect is looking for a talented Frontend Developer to create beautiful, responsive web applications. You'll work closely with our design and backend teams to implement user interfaces that are both visually appealing and highly performant.
responsibilities: Implement responsive UIs using React and modern CSS
Work with designers to translate mockups into functional components
Optimize web applications for maximum speed and scalability
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsive design
Write clean, maintainable code with appropriate documentation
requirements: Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with modern CSS frameworks and methodologies
Basic knowledge of web performance optimization
education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience
